description: The trap is generated when a SIP gateway fails to register.

event.Summary: SIP gateway $v1 registeration failed due to $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPRegisterFailure H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPID s EXAMPLE H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPServerIPAddressType i 0 H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPServerIPAddress s EXAMPLE H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPServerPort i 9999 H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPRegisterFailReason s EXAMPLE

description: The unique identification of a SIP gateway.
This value couldn't be modified unless
variables.name: H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPID

description: The source IP address type of a SIP server.
variables.name: H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPServerIPAddressType

description: The IP address of a SIP server.
variables.name: H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPServerIPAddress

description: The port of a SIP server.
variables.name: H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPServerPort

description: The object describes the reason that a SIP gateway fails to register.
variables.name: H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPRegisterFailReason

description: The trap is generated when a request with its credential fail to
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPAuthenticateFailure H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPID s EXAMPLE H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPAuthenReqMethod i 1

description: The unique identification of a SIP gateway.
This value couldn't be modified unless
variables.name: H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPID

description: The object denotes the method of a request that fails to authenticate.
variables.name: H3C-VOSIP-MIB::h3cSIPAuthenReqMethod

description: The trap is generated when a switch happens between master and

event.Summary: SIP server switched between master and slave
